author: blankblank
body: Imagine a world where Bernie bro’s could put aside their undying love of Bernie long enough to help us remove the most poisonous president in U.S. history. Come on people! We need you! Let’s focus on the task at hand!

body: Thank god we arent heading into a world full of free stuff for people who dont deserve it
